content:
During the last day, there were 10 settlements under hostile fire: curakhov, Mirnograd, Slavyansk, Kurakhivka village, Ocheretyne, Shcherbinovka, Galitsynivka, Kalinovo, Karlovka, Umansk.

About thisreported March 24Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine.

The blows damaged 41 civilians - 29 residential buildings, an educational institution, a boiler room, a social and critical infrastructure.

To Mirnograd, Russia directed 4 C-300 missiles-injured two civilians, damaged 18 apartment buildings, private home, boiler room, administrative building, educational institution, communications.

From the artillery, the occupiers fired Kurakhivka - two people were injured, 4 private homes were destroyed.

The cane aircraft damaged an apartment building and a civilian car.

In addition, the police recorded the effects of a blow to Oleksiyevo-Druzhkivtsi, which occurred on the night of March 23. Russian troops used the UPMB D30-CM Air Bomb-13 private homes were damaged.

Criminal proceedings under Art. 438 (violation of the laws and customs of war) of the Criminal Code of Ukraine.

Asreported earlier Armyinform,Rosarmia attacked 12 regions of Ukraine from mortars, tanks and artillery.
title: The enemy struck more than one and a half thousand beats a day
description: This was reported on March 24 by the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine. As a result of blows ...
author: Army Inform
